titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CHLAMYDIA TEST RESULT - Permitted Codes

strow.stentry: Equivocal - tests with an unconfirmed initially reactive sample or invalid tests with unconfirmed reactive or unconfirmed positive results
Insufficient specimen - samples which do not have enough sample present to test
Inhibitory result - tests with an indeterminate test result
Other - tests can not be categorised as options 01 - 05: Unable to process sample
